tool_description: Free feed with IOCs -  malicious URLs, domains, IPs, and hashes. [Website: https://tweetfeed.live]
title: TweetFeed

api_list.name: v1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tweetfeed.p.rapidapi.com/v1/{time}/{filter1}/{filter2}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tweetfeed.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: time
parameters.description:
Select 1 of these timeframes:

**today** - Today starting 00:00 UTC)
**week** - Last 7 days
**month** - Last 30 days
**year** - Last 365 days

parameters.name: filter1
parameters.description:
Can be an specific user, type or tag:

Type → **url** / **domain** / **ip** / **sha256** / **md5**
Tag → **phishing** / **ransomware** / **CobaltStrike** ...
User → **@malwrhunterteam** / **@1ZRR4H** / **@MBThreatIntel** / ... (don't forget the @)

parameters.name: filter2
parameters.description:
Can be an specific user, type or tag:

Type → **url** / **domain** / **ip** / **sha256** / **md5**
Tag → **phishing** / **ransomware** / **CobaltStrike** ...
User → **@malwrhunterteam** / **@1ZRR4H** / **@MBThreatIntel** / ... (don't forget the @)

utterances.utterance: Show me the malicious URLs detected today.
What phishing domains were reported in the last week?
List ransomware-related IPs from the last month.
Get all CobaltStrike-related SHA256 hashes from the last year.
Show me today's malicious URLs reported by @malwrhunterteam.
What phishing URLs were detected in the last week?
List all malicious IPs reported by @1ZRR4H in the last month.
Show me ransomware-related domains detected today.
Get all MD5 hashes related to phishing from the last year.
What malicious URLs were reported by @MBThreatIntel in the last week?
